insert_linebreaks.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_INSERT_LINEBREAKS_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_INSERT_LINEBREAKS_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // insert_linebreaks.hpp
00011

00018 
00019 #include <cassert>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp> // for BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00022 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00023 namespace std{ using ::memcpy; }
00024 #endif
00025 
00026 #include <boost/serialization/pfto.hpp>
00027 
00028 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_adaptor.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_traits.hpp>
00030 
00031 namespace boost { 
00032 namespace archive {
00033 namespace iterators {
00034 
00036 // insert line break every N characters
00037 template<
00038     class Base, 
00039     int N, 
00040     class CharType = BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_value<Base>::type
00041 >
00042 class insert_linebreaks : 
00043     public iterator_adaptor<
00044         insert_linebreaks<Base, N, CharType>,
00045         Base,
00046         CharType,
00047         single_pass_traversal_tag,
00048         CharType
00049     >
00050 {
00051 private:
00052     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00053     typedef iterator_adaptor<
00054         insert_linebreaks<Base, N, CharType>,
00055         Base,
00056         CharType,
00057         single_pass_traversal_tag,
00058         CharType
00059     > super_t;
00060 
00061     bool equal(const insert_linebreaks<Base, N, CharType> & rhs) const {
00062         return
00063 //            m_count == rhs.m_count
00064 //            && base_reference() == rhs.base_reference()
00065             this->base_reference() == rhs.base_reference()
00066         ;
00067     }
00068 
00069     void increment() {
00070         if(m_count == N){
00071             m_count = 0;
00072             return;
00073         }
00074         ++m_count;
00075         ++(this->base_reference());
00076     }
00077     CharType dereference() const {
00078         if(m_count == N)
00079             return '\n';
00080         return * (this->base_reference());
00081     }
00082     unsigned int m_count;
00083 public:
00084     // make composible buy using templated constructor
00085     template<class T>
00086     insert_linebreaks(BOOST_PFTO_WRAPPER(T)  start) :
00087         super_t(Base(BOOST_MAKE_PFTO_WRAPPER(static_cast<T>(start)))),
00088         m_count(0)
00089     {}
00090     // intel 7.1 doesn't like default copy constructor
00091     insert_linebreaks(const insert_linebreaks & rhs) : 
00092         super_t(rhs.base_reference()),
00093         m_count(rhs.m_count)
00094     {}
00095 };
00096 
00097 } // namespace iterators
00098 } // namespace archive
00099 } // namespace boost
00100 
00101 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_INSERT_LINEBREAKS_HPP
